Title: Relates to residential solar and energy storage permitting
Summary: Requires all municipalities with a population of five thousand or more to implement SolarAPP plus by January first, two thousand twenty-seven, for features supporting residential building permits for solar photovoltaic systems, energy storage systems paired with a residential solar energy system, main electric panel upgrades, and main electric panel derates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to residential solar and energy storage permitting
